dmca.title: Do the Right Thing
dmca.body:
(Name),

 This page must be taken down:  http://spamkings.oreilly.com/archives/2005/12/the_duke_of_spam_1.html . You will also remove any reference to me on any servers or intellectual property yourself or affiliated partners represent on the Internet. You will start by removing this page. I will provide you 72 hours to comply or I will have our attorneys file a $7.5 M lawsuit against this site, your company and individuals such as yourself and (Name). Once this is complete, you will then authorize a sworn affidavit drafted by our attorneys that any mention of me, EmailResults.net or MediaHeights has been destroyed on your servers and those affiliated with your organization. 

You have lumped me in on a site with two known individuals convicted of felonies, provided fraudulent public content in reference to Howard Dean and have slandered my character. Do the right thing and I will leave your organization alone to focus on bad guys. Do the wrong thing and allow this slander to continue and I will leverage my connections with the incumbant political party and federal legal colleagues to assist me in prosecuting this case and I have a feeling this just may indefinately destroy your reputation and satiate my need for justice. I mean it (Name). I have always been fair but make no mistake
